Would you like to work from home at your own time and pace?
Oildirectory.com is looking for Canadian sales agents who would like to work from home. We are a rapidly growing online and offline electronic oilfield directory that receives around 3 million hits from approximately 60,000 unique visitors every month.
We need sales agents to sell upgraded listings and other products on a generous commission basis.
Training and sales aids are provided
